<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twin Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=4831) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 148 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57) (Level 12), [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247) (Level 12), [Avenger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=282) (Level 12)

**Trigger**
A creature within your reach critically fails to Strike you

**Requirements**
You are benefiting from Twin Parry

</column>

---

A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon. Make a melee Strike or Disarm action against the triggering opponent.

<title level="2">Twin Riposte leads to...</title>
[Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4844), [Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4903)
